sentences.sentence: I can't get enough of them, especially around Halloween when the shadows from the leafless trees take on ominous shapes.
sentences.translation: 对于它们我百看不厌，尤其是在万圣节期间，那些光秃秃的树的阴影呈现出不详的形状。
